subtitle: There are many types of meditations that we can do
depending on where we place our awareness and on what part of our being we place our awareness
whether it be our current state of mind emotionally or psychologically or whether we
want to reflect on our memories or whether we want to transcend the content of our lives all together
wouldn't it be nice if we could always transcend the content of our lives the memory the images
the emotions attached to our lives
but there's usually something in the way of all of that of escaping all of that
and so this meditation is on releasing any pain that you may have
that may be in the way of your own spiritual transcendence or progression
it's to focus on anything you need to focus on which is holding you back
there's always something that we feel we can work on if there wasn't something that we could work on
then why would we be here in the first place
whether you have pain towards a particular situation or a past experience
or even if you don't know why you're feeling a certain way but you feel depressed
or perhaps upset or just very emotional we can use this time to collect those feelings
and process them and gather the fortitude to let them go and to understand them with intelligence
love and acceptance this leads to our balance and a greater understanding of our own nature
it's important to remind ourselves that problems can only be solved with peace and mental calm
and that we cannot see the solutions to our lives
unless we have the serenity that comes with mental and emotional clarity
and so let us take some moments to relax the body and mind into its natural state
breathing in deeply
as if you just woke up in the morning
and exhaling with vitality and release
breathing in with strength and relaxation
breathing out with peace and surrender
this time is for you you alone
the worries of the world are always just the thought away
you don't need to be compulsive about the world
your only job now is to be here
listening
censoring
feeling
become aware of the body
the muscles in the feet
let them go
relax your legs
groin
belly
chest
let every breath be natural
let every breath dissolve tensions in the body
you can visualize a white light soaking your muscles and bones
easing any tension
let go of the jaw
back of the head
let go of the tiny muscles behind the eyes
relax your arms and hands
be still
be peaceful
be rested
as you become more still
more balanced
more equilibrated
let us enter our body and mind
in a deeper way
let us unplug from our usual ordinary way of perceiving reality
let us change our perspective
into a more reflective one
in this deeper state
see in your mind a time when you suffered or felt pain
if you can't think of a certain time or situation simply feel any pain
or suffering that you may have had within you at any point in the past that you want to release
whatever you've chosen to focus on or process this is your time now to be with it
to feel it embrace it
it can be to do with any emotion any challenge
any kind of internal struggle or battle
it may be psychological
something to do with a particular ego
or a desire
become aware of the peculiar sense of pain that you accompany with it
this pain only exists because there is some form of resistance towards it
and resistance of the pain only amplifies the pain
acceptance of pain helps us move beyond
and so be with the pain the suffering
be with the energetic charge of it
where do you feel it in your body
it may be in your chest
in your stomach
in your head
breathe with the suffering
perhaps the energetic charge of this emotion memory
or impulse is too strong and you feel overwhelmed that's okay stick with it
if there's emotions arising such as fear
despair or perhaps the body just wants to cry let it cry
let there be a release
there's no need for identification
these emotions no matter how overwhelming are not you
they do not control you
they do not make you who you are
they are just movements of energy coming in
and coming out
going even deeper now into yourself
feeling the power of our own imagination
our capacity to dream
visualize yourself in a beautiful sunny lush green open field
with beautiful large trees all around you
you can feel the sun's warmth on your skin
your feet in the soil
and you decide to lay down on the grass to rest
you face up basking in the sun and looking at the blue sky
you see a few birds circling far above you
you can just hear their calls in the distance
you remember for a moment that although you're in this beautiful welcoming and loving place
that you have this pain within you
and from the kindness and safety of this place you're invited to
project your emotions and thoughts into the sky
all of your problems worries fears doubts anxieties
beliefs that no longer serve you
and each one of these
represents a cloud in the sky
the stronger and more painful
a thought or emotion is the bigger and darker the cloud is
some clouds may be very gray others not so much
even for every little thought a cloud appears
and as the clouds reflect your inner state
the peace and the deep love that exists in this place makes it so that no thought or emotion
or any type of suffering can exist for long
and as these clouds stay they begin to dissolve
or fly away
the sun becomes even warmer
and the sun is the power of your awareness dissolving the clouds
the pain the suffering
only for there to be peace
and space
in this awareness you realize
memories from the past live on only as memory
nothing more
the sensation of reliving memory is not to you it is just imagination
you do not need to be identified with the movement of imagination
identification means to believe that you are these thoughts or feelings
it means that you believe these thoughts are you
but would you still exist if you didn't have these thoughts
go into it
you're still here
life goes on
when you are simply able to bring awareness to your thoughts and inner state
then they start to dissolve
and as you look up at the sky
there is only the warmth of the sun
the brightness of its light
penetrating and giving life to everything it touches
be at peace
be still

to think

awakening
out of attachment

we always focus on the content of our lives
